General.Name: Joyware Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Joyware Electronics Co.,Ltd operates in the video surveillance industry. The company offers high-definition network cameras; infrared temperature measurement camera products; digital video transmission series products; video integrated management platform; a range of storage products; and display and control series products. It provides professional digital video network monitoring solutions for highways, safe cities, intelligent transportation, financial monitoring, and other fields. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
